pr_title: DROOLS-4905 / DROOLS-4742: [DMN Designer] Code Completion - Index all elements named by users / Add suggestions about "requirements" and/or "dependencies" of a decision node

timeline.bodyText: Are also data type variables? If not we should maybe rename. Also thinking if we shouldn't aply single responsibility principle and have one method getVariableSuggestions and getDataTypesSuggestions. What do you think?
timeline.author: jomarko

replies.bodyText: Seems like a good idea. Applied!
replies.author: karreiro
